comments.html:
I can confirm frame-relay works over POS. Either to your SP, or direct connection between routers, just like any other interface supporting frame-relay.
Not sure about x.25 though, I don't see this encapsulation option on 7200 or 7300 and doubt it will be elsewhere nowadays.
comments.name: Alexandra Stanovska
